entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10.
